entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
